page.title: 05LIFE STYLES-ANDREW-AGED 9
page.content: I wake up at 6.45 when I hear my dad's alarm go off and get up and go downstairs and have a cup of tea with him.At 7.45 I have my breakfast then say bye bye to mum,collect my bus-fare,walk up Northwood Lane and catch tne bus to school.The lessons we have are music, maths and some english in the morning.I go home for my dinner at 12-0-clock,then it's back for the afternoon.The afternoon lessons are Geography.We are learning about orienteering with Mr Yates, and R.E. where we are finding out about people's religion in India.At playtimes I play football with my friends.It's time to go home at 3.30, then I go swimming for half an hour.I usually watch T.V. in the evening and go to bed at about 9.30. Andrew Butters.
